events.text:
[color=#ffed29]("I am pleased to announce that the City of Ventreville has approved the Medicinal Grant to the Avidine Factory in the production of [b]Remedium[/b].")
[color=#ffed29]("The Avidine Factory will be given 50,000 gold coins for the urgent production of a cure for the [b]Devilâ€™s Lung[/b].")
[color=#ffed29](Oh, sweet, I didn't know we got a grant!)
[color=#ffed29](50,000 gold is A LOT of money...man, we should get a raise!)
